arts.ttl: Southampton were like innocent kids - Juric
arts.sum: Southampton manager Ivan Juric says his side were like "innocent kids" after conceding three late goals against Manchester United at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Premier League issue statement as Man Utd denied penalty during Southampton clash

arts.ttl: Southampton are on the brink of hiring a new sporting director after losing Jason Wilcox to Man United
arts.sum: Southampton are closing in on appointing their new sporting director following Jason Wilcox's departure for Manchester United. Wilcox left Southampton for Old Trafford in April.

arts.ttl: “No, I didn’t receive an invitation” – Manager quizzed about whether Southampton tried to appoint him recently
arts.sum: Santa Clara manager Vasco Matos has insisted he was not approached by Southampton to become their new manager. Record have a short interview with the 44-year-old today in which he insists Southampton did not come calling for him. arts.sum: Southampton make the long trip to Manchester United in the Premier League this evening.
